thread.title: Excellent mid range hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent mid range hotel - Review of Rhodes Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: tomhX2055YI
title: Excellent mid range hotel
text: Stayed here for two nights ater a lapse of some 20 years.Reception staff were all tops, extremely helpful. A lot of stairs to climb but this is an old London building in good condition.Breakfast was continental and adequate, service good. Stayed here with my wife and look forward to next visit.
